      • featureIndexFromLabelIndex

        public static Index featureIndexFromLabelIndex(Index labelIndex)
        Creates an index from the label index. This is meant to represent an index list of labelStrings.
        Parameters:
        labelIndex - the index to convert
        Returns:
        an index where each label is a number
